actions: [{'command': 'Open Excel', 'file': 'CustomerData.xlsx'}, {'command': 'Read Range', 'sheet': 'Subscriptions'}, {'command': 'Validate Data', 'rule': 'CheckMissingEmails'}, {'command': 'Launch Browser', 'url': '${CRM_URL}'}, {'command': 'Login', 'credentials': 'CRM_Creds'}, {'command': 'Update Records', 'loop': 'Each Customer'}]
temp_GFB_Autx.description: This automation basically helps in SAMS part it will, take input the SAMS excel file, and will calculate the column values , columns are J,K,L , they have their each seperate formula, and we are converting the excel data into data table and returning the datatable as output, there can be multiple combination of werse code , combination of multiple werse codes are seperated by comma ",".
